::: {#me}
I am a postdoctoral researcher at the University of Münster, Germany and the managing director of the recently founded [Münster Center for Open Science](https://www.uni-muenster.de/MueCOS/en/index.html).

## Mission

My goal is to improve the accessibility and quality of research.

## Education

-   2021: PhD in Psychology

-   2017: M.Sc. in Consumer Psychology and Market Research

-   2016: B.Sc. in Business Psychology
:::
